column2: [FromFrom.GetTitledName], a follower of [FromFrom.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap], have sacrificed [From.GetTitledName] to his cruel god! After bringing [From.GetHerHim] to one their hideouts, the cultists tied [From.GetFirstName] on an altar and slowly mutilated [From.GetHerHim] until [From.GetSheHe] breath [From.GetHerHis] last.
May [This.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] see [From.GetHerHim] safely to the afterlife.
[From.GetTitledName] was sacrificed to [This.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]! [From.GetHerHim] was placed on an altar and his life was offered to [This.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap].
The thread has been broken and [This.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] sated.
